headline: Will Mondelez International's (MDLZ) Expanded Cocoa Sourcing Strategy Shift Its Narrative on Commodity Costs?
summary: Earlier this quarter, Mondelez International experienced financial pressures as rising cocoa prices, driven by crop yield concerns in West Africa, affected one of its key input costs. In response to these supply chain disruptions, Mondelez has worked to diversify its cocoa sourcing to Southeast Asia, aiming to reduce risk from regional shocks. We will explore how the company's expanded cocoa sourcing initiatives could influence its investment outlook amid ongoing commodity cost...
